title: The US will now review H-1B applicants' social media — and require them to make profiles public, State Department says
description: H-1B applicants and their dependents will face expanded online checks as the US tightens scrutiny of skilled-worker visas, a spokesperson said.
content:
The US will require H-1B applicants to make their social media public for visa vetting, a State Department spokesperson said.Andrew Harnik/Getty Images
